creditline: Gift of Shared Ventures in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: backs of two men and one woman seated on suitcases, with other suitcases and bags scattered around; men wear overcoats; woman wears a hat and a fur shawl and has patterned stitching and pleating on the back of her coat

title: Douglas Fairbanks, Mary Pickford and Charlie Chaplin, the founders of United Artists, Pasadena Train Station, California
